description: '''Hookah rap''', or '''hookah pop''' ({{lang-rus|кальян-рэп|kal'yan-rep|kalʲ'jan rɛp}}, {{lang-rus|кальянный рэп|kal'yannyy rep|kɐlʲ'jannɨj rɛp}}, {{lang-rus|шиша-рэп|shisha-rep|ʂɨ'ʂa-rɛp}}), is a genre of [[Russian rap]] or [[Russian pop]] which originated in Russia during the mid 2010s and popularized across the [[Post-Soviet states|post-Soviet countries]] in the late 2010s.
